title: Isle Royale National Park: Webcams
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Webcams              Webcams                       Tobin Harbor Webcam Tobin Harbor is located on the northeast end of Isle Royale, near Rock Harbor.  In the early 20th century, it was a popular summer haven for vacationers.  Visitors today enjoy the peaceful paddling and boating opportunities it offers.  Note:  The webcam uploads photographs only when the park is operating (end of April through mid-October).    View webcam                              Mott Island Dock Webcam Mott Island, Isle Royale National Park's summer headquarters, is the nucleus of operations on the island.  It is a barrier island located on the south side of Rock Harbor Channel.  Note:  The webcam is solar powered.  Photographs will be uploaded only if there is enough sunshine available.   View webcam
